original_text:
Who can strip off his outer garment?
    Who would come near him with a bridle?
korean_text: 누가 그것의 겉가죽을 벗기겠으며 그것에게 겹재갈을 물릴 수 있겠느냐

sentences.original_text: Who can strip off his outer garment?
sentences.korean_translation: 누가 그의 겉옷을 벗길 수 있는가?

sentences.original_text: Who would come near him with a bridle?
